ygData.subject: Re: Changes to blacksmithing in patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noticed another change involving files.  I have a regular customer that purchases studs from me (hopefully will be moving up to steel boning soon) and I
ygData.messageBody:
I have noticed another change involving files. I have a regular customer
that purchases studs from me (hopefully will be moving up to steel boning
soon) and I only need one file now. I haven't failed a stud in a very long
time so I don't know what happens if you do, but if you succeed you get a
stud and your file back! Ok, so it's not a biggie, but it is nice only
having to make 30 metal bits instead of 40 now for 10 studs. I keep the
same file and reuse it.

Draethar
High Elf Enchanter
Accomplished Jeweler and Master Smith
